name: Fruit
description: Citrus, tree fruits, red berries, dark berries, stone fruit..

subcategories.description: A genus of flowering trees and shrubs in the family Rutaceae.
subcategories.name: Citrus

flavors.name: Lemon
flavors.description: Bright and tart, often associated with fresh acidity.

flavors.name: Lemon Zest
flavors.description: Sharp and aromatic, with a slightly bitter edge.

flavors.name: Lime
flavors.description: Fresh and tangy, with a slightly sweeter undertone than lemon.

flavors.name: Lime Zest
flavors.description: Crisp and aromatic, with a strong citrus aroma.

flavors.name: Grapefruit
flavors.description: Tart with a hint of bitterness, often juicy and refreshing.

flavors.name: Ruby Red Grapefruit
flavors.description: Sweeter and less tart than regular grapefruit.

flavors.name: Orange
flavors.description: Sweet and juicy, with a balanced acidity.

flavors.name: Orange Zest
flavors.description: Bitter and aromatic, often used to describe spiced or zesty wines.

flavors.name: Tangerine
flavors.description: Sweeter and softer than orange, with a floral aroma.

flavors.name: Mandarin
flavors.description: Delicately sweet, with a slightly perfumed citrus note.

flavors.name: Yuzu
flavors.description: Complex and tart, often with floral and herbal undertones.

flavors.name: Kumquat
flavors.description: Tangy and slightly bitter, with a unique sweetness in the peel.

flavors.name: Bergamot
flavors.description: Fragrant and floral, reminiscent of Earl Grey tea.

subcategories.name: Red Fruits
subcategories.description: Strawberries, raspberries, red berries, garden berries

flavors.name: Strawberry
flavors.description: Sweet and juicy, with a hint of freshness.

flavors.name: Raspberry
flavors.description: Tart and tangy, with a rich fruity aroma.

flavors.name: Cherry
flavors.description: Juicy and sweet, with a slight tart edge.

flavors.name: Cranberry
flavors.description: Tart and bright, often with a sharp acidity.

flavors.name: Red Currant
flavors.description: Tart and zesty, with a refreshing juiciness.

flavors.name: Blackberry
flavors.description: Dark and jammy, with a hint of tartness.

flavors.name: Blueberry
flavors.description: Sweet with a deep, rich berry flavor.

flavors.name: Black Currant
flavors.description: Deep and intense, with a tart and earthy profile.

flavors.name: Plum
flavors.description: Rich and sweet, with a soft texture and subtle tartness.

flavors.name: Elderberry
flavors.description: Dark and earthy, with a slightly bitter finish.

flavors.name: Peach
flavors.description: Sweet and juicy, with a subtle floral aroma.

flavors.name: Apricot
flavors.description: Delicately sweet, with a slight tartness.

flavors.name: Nectarine
flavors.description: Sweet and smooth, with a bright aroma.

flavors.name: Green Apple
flavors.description: Crisp and tart, with a refreshing acidity.

flavors.name: Golden Apple
flavors.description: Sweet and mellow, with a softer, rounder profile than green apple.

flavors.name: Red Apple
flavors.description: Sweet and juicy, with a balanced, familiar flavor.

flavors.name: Pear
flavors.description: Delicate and sweet, with a soft, floral finish.

flavors.name: Baked Apple
flavors.description: Warm and spiced, reminiscent of cooked apples with cinnamon.

flavors.name: Quince
flavors.description: Tart and aromatic, with a unique floral and apple-like profile.

flavors.name: Pineapple
flavors.description: Sweet and tangy, with a sharp tropical aroma.

flavors.name: Mango
flavors.description: Rich and sweet, with a smooth tropical flavor.

flavors.name: Papaya
flavors.description: Sweet and creamy, with a mild tropical flavor.

flavors.name: Banana
flavors.description: Sweet and creamy, with a smooth, soft texture.

flavors.name: Raisin
flavors.description: Sweet and chewy, with a concentrated fruitiness.

flavors.name: Fig
flavors.description: Sweet and earthy, with a honeyed flavor.

flavors.name: Date
flavors.description: Rich and caramel-like, with a sweet, dense texture.

flavors.name: Prune
flavors.description: Sweet and slightly tart, with a deep, earthy flavor.

flavors.name: Rose
flavors.description: Elegant and perfumed, with a soft floral sweetness.

flavors.name: Jasmine
flavors.description: Delicately sweet and intensely aromatic.

flavors.name: Lavender
flavors.description: Herbal and floral, with a slightly sweet aroma.

flavors.name: Orange Blossom
flavors.description: Bright and citrusy, with a sweet floral aroma.

flavors.name: Mint
flavors.description: Cool and refreshing, with a sharp herbal aroma.

flavors.name: Eucalyptus
flavors.description: Cooling and aromatic, with a woody undertone.

flavors.name: Basil
flavors.description: Fresh and peppery, with a sweet herbal flavor.

flavors.name: Sage
flavors.description: Earthy and slightly peppery, with a woody aroma.

flavors.name: Flint
flavors.description: Sharp and stony, reminiscent of struck match or wet stones.

flavors.name: Chalk
flavors.description: Dry and powdery, evoking the aroma of crushed chalk.

flavors.name: Slate
flavors.description: Clean and mineral-like, often associated with wet stone aromas.

flavors.name: Salinity
flavors.description: A subtle saltiness, evoking sea spray or briny notes.

flavors.name: Matchstick
flavors.description: A sharp, sulfurous aroma reminiscent of struck matches.

flavors.name: Gunpowder
flavors.description: Smoky and sharp, reminiscent of spent fireworks.

flavors.name: Wet Wool
flavors.description: Earthy and damp, with a unique textural aroma.

flavors.name: Rubber
flavors.description: Dark and smoky, with an industrial edge.

flavors.name: Leather
flavors.description: Earthy and rich, often found in aged red wines.

flavors.name: Tobacco
flavors.description: Warm and smoky, reminiscent of dried leaves or cigars.

flavors.name: Dried Fruit
flavors.description: Sweet and concentrated, like raisins or figs.

flavors.name: Earth
flavors.description: Rich and damp, evocative of forest floor or soil.

flavors.name: Mushroom
flavors.description: Earthy and savory, often found in mature wines.

flavors.name: Honey
flavors.description: Sweet and floral, common in aged white wines.

flavors.name: Vanilla
flavors.description: Sweet and creamy, often a hallmark of oak aging.

flavors.name: Coconut
flavors.description: Rich and tropical, often associated with American oak.

flavors.name: Spice
flavors.description: Warm and aromatic, with hints of cinnamon or nutmeg.

flavors.name: Smoke
flavors.description: Smoky and toasty, imparted by charred oak barrels.

flavors.name: Toast
flavors.description: Warm and toasty, reminiscent of baked bread or caramelized crust.

flavors.name: Caramel
flavors.description: Sweet and buttery, with a rich depth.
